data.persona: I only come out at night. I hunt for my food. I can see very well in the dark.
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The doctor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to go to the doctor's home
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to wait until the doctor goes to sleep then steal some medicine
data.long_motivation: I'm going to nurse my owl friend back to health who's hurt his wing
